titleStmt.title: A witty ansvver, and vindication to a foolish pamphlet, intituled New orders nevv, agreed upon by a parliament of Round-heads. Or, Old orders old, newly vampt by a Parliament of rattle-heads. Confirmed by the brethren of the malignant party now assembled at Rattle heads Court, a way-bit from Yorke. With the ignorant rashnes of Mr Short-breath, a damnfied companion, Mr Speaker of the House. Avowed by Nicholas Periwig, alias no eares, Cler. Parl. Ratle.
titleStmt.author: Periwig, Nicholas.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
